message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle at $125?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Can you go any lower?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to go down to $122, but that's as low as I can go. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still hoping to save a bit more. How about we meet at $118?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm going to have to draw a line in the sand. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $123, but that's my final offer.
